plays.text: Penalty to Bobby Holik 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mikael Samuelsson
Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Dan Focht and Brian Holzinger
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Interference Ted Donato
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Jamie Lundmark
Goal scored by Tomas Surovy assisted by Brian Holzinger and Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Kent Manderville 2 minutes for High Sticking Dan LaCouture
Goal scored by Eric Meloche unassisted
Goal scored by Brian Leetch assisted by Ted Donato and Dan LaCouture
